description: assign returns a new DataFrame with all original columns in addition to new ones.
quote: A new object with all original columns in addition to new ones.

description: Existing columns that are re-assigned will be overwritten.
quote: Existing columns that are re-assigned will be overwritten.

description: The original DataFrame is not modified; assign returns a new object.
quote: Returns: DataFrame - A new object with all original columns in addition to new ones.

description: Callable values are evaluated on the DataFrame to produce the assigned column.
quote: Where the value is callable, evaluated on the DataFrame

description: Non-callable values are directly assigned as the new column.
quote: Where the value is not callable, (e.g. a Series or a scalar), simply assigned.

description: Items are computed and assigned into df in order, so later items can use earlier results.
quote: Items are computed and assigned into df in order.

description: Later items in kwargs may refer to newly created or modified columns from earlier items.
quote: Later items in **kwargs may refer to newly created or modified columns in 'df'
